name: My Outer Space Puzzle - Explorer Puzzles for kids and toddlers
name_original: My Outer Space Puzzle - Explorer Puzzles for kids and toddlers
description:
Go with us on a discovery journey an explore the fantastic world of stars and planets!

Let your kids and toddlers discover the amazing world of stars and planets with this cute app - Try it now for FREE!
The perfect children's puzzle with beautifully illustrated outer space graphics and animations. The cute outer space puzzle promotes hand-eye coordination, logical thinking and your child's memory skills.

„Does the rocket match this shape?“ - Let your kid discover it!

CONTENT:
- Universal App for iPhones, iPads and iPods!
- Children Safe – WITHOUT DISTURBING ADVERTISING!
- SAFE PLAY – The parents area can only be activated by entering a number. Thus, parents have more security and control!
- Different REWARDS!
- You can unlock a BONUS-PUZZLE by rating the app!

Do you and your child like the puzzle? With only one InApp purchase you can unlock the full version with a lot more content (all puzzles and more reward effects)!

Our promise to you: All our apps are developed with certified educators and renowned illustrators in cooperation with young parents and children!

If you have questions or are interested how we develop our apps with children and young parents, send an email to: info@mcpeppergames.com
